Package com.clorabase.clorastore

Class Query

java.lang.Object
com.clorabase.clorastore.Query
public class Query extends Object
A class to perform query and sort data on the basis of some condition. Only the data inside the provided collection is queried. Query operations may take longer time if size of document is large. If so, wrap it in a background thread.

    Creates a query from the provided collection.

  • Method Details

    • whichHas

      public Collection[] whichHas(String docOrColl_name)
      Query collections which contains the provided collection or document in it.
      Parameters:
      docOrColl_name - The name of the document or collection which you have to query
      Returns:
      The collections which has the following document or collection in it.

    • whereEqual

      public Document[] whereEqual(@NonNull String field, @NonNull Object value)
      Finds the document on the basis of its data. It will query all the document from the current collection till it finds at least one document whose filed 'field' has value 'value'.
      Parameters:
      field - The field name in the document
      value - The value of the field that is to be checked across
      Returns:
      an array of the Document which has field with the corresponding value.

    • where

      public Document[] where(@NonNull Predicate<Map<String,? super Object>> condition)
      Query documents on the basis of given condition. The condition is evaluated on the data (Map) of the document. If the data of the document matches the given predicate, then it is considered otherwise not.
      Parameters:
      condition - The boolean function that is to be checked
      Returns:
      Array of Document which satisfy the given predicate.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the data is not same in documents (under the querying collection) and the key in predicate is not present. To avoid this, use method

    • whereObject

      public <T> Document[] whereObject(Class<T> clazz, Predicate<T> condition)
      Collect the document which has POJO that meets your condition.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class of your POJO
      condition - A boolean function that is evaluated as the condition to include the document.
      Returns:
      Array of Document as the query result

    • whereGreater

      public Document[] whereGreater(@NonNull String field, Number value)
      Returns the document where the 'value' is greater then value of 'field' in the data of document.
      Parameters:
      field - The filed to compare
      value - The value to compare across
      Returns:
      An array of Document which satisfy the given condition.
      Throws:
      ClorastoreException - if field does not denotes a number

    • whereSmaller

      public Document[] whereSmaller(@NonNull String field, Number value)
      Returns the document where the 'value' is smaller then value of 'field' in the data of document.
      Parameters:
      field - The filed to compare
      value - The value to compare across
      Returns:
      An array of Document which satisfy the given condition.
      Throws:
      ClorastoreException - if field does not denotes a number
